name: They Stole My Teddy Bear
description:
Submission for the Lost Relic Games Gamejam by BigManCloudy from Silent Earth Games.

This is a game about a little kid who loves his teddy bear a lot, he has an emotional connection with him. The bad guys came and stole his teddy, tho. He wants you to help him look for it!

This game has 7 ENDINGS! Try getting all of them.

Warning:

This game is extremely dumb and you'll probably lose a lot of brain cells while playing it.

I created this in like 1.5 days even tho I had 10 (stuff came up).

Controls:

WSAD/arrow keys to move, Z and X to interact with stuff.

Made using GB Studio.

Credits:

Programming: BigManCloudy
Tileset: https://itch.io/queue/c/2472289/gb-assets?game_id=1462252
Artwork (except the tileset): BigManCloudy
Music: BigManCloudy
